prompt:
Text: Mango-Black Bean Salsa. This fiery, flavorful salsa is excellent with tortilla chips, spooned over roasted meat or fish, or as a topping for quesadillas.
Ingredients: (mango, avocado, no-salt-added black beans, red onion, jalapeño pepper, cilantro, lime, salt).
Img2Text prompt: A bowl of mango and black bean salsa with tortilla chips. The salsa also has onions, jalapeño peppers and cilantro.

Text: Garlic Parmesan Pasta. The hardest part is chopping the parsley.
Ingredients: (parsley, garlic, butter, chicken broth, milk, parmesan cheese, salt, ground pepper).
Img2Text prompt: A bowl of garlic parmesan pasta with parmesan cheese and parsley.

Text: One-Hour Pizza. The ultimate challenge for a pizza master with 30 years of experience? Making a good one in just 60 minutes.
Ingredients: (flour, sugar, white vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, salt, canned tomatoes, oregano, ground pepper, red pepper flakes, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese).
Img2Text prompt: A pizza with tomato sauce, parmesan cheese and mozzarella cheese on top of a pizza board.

Text: Double Spinach Pasta Casserole with Pesto & Asiago Cheese. An easy, freezer-friendly pasta bake that's filled with pesto, Asiago cheese, and baby spinach.
Ingredients: (chicken breast, egg (whole, raw, fresh), ground pepper, salt, NAME_1, cream, Greek yogurt, parmesan cheese (hard), garlic, spinach, shallots, oil, macaroni (dry, unenriched).
Img2Text prompt: A casserole dish with pasta, chicken breast, spinach, pesto and asiago cheese. The top is garnished
